creator: lynchCR@live.com
text:
I can not access documents in default-site directory except for index.html - all have the same permissions, I set DocumentRoot to this directory just in case that was needed (but then why would it find index.html) very frustrating.  

..Wanted to subscribe to the mailing list to ask what I have done wrong in setting up Apache, but the list server bounces back its confirmation mail,  I tried 'reply' as it suggested,  I then did cut and paste and sent it, as it suggested, and then I used the variation at users-request with the subject set to the reply address the mailing list provided, and that bounced too.

creator: poirier@pobox.com
text: This isn't a support forum for the mailing lists.  I suggest you mail users-help@httpd.apache.org about your subscription problems.
